item.title: Deep C, understand the language before you write code.
item.description: I came across a slide which explains why is it hard to program in C/C++ programming language when you don’t have a proper understanidng of the same. Here is slide which demonostrates why a proper understanding of language is neccessary before you code. Courtesy :: Deep C by Olve Maudal
